alerts.text: üö® CRITICAL: Reentrancy exploit detected on multiple Curve Finance factory pools. At least 4 pools affected: alETH, msETH, pETH. Estimated loss: $24M+. Users advised to withdraw liquidity immediately. #DeFiSecurity
We are aware of the exploit on several factory pools. Core pools (3pool, stETH) are SAFE. Investigation ongoing. DO NOT interact with affected pools until further notice.
üî¥ LIVE UPDATE: Vyper compiler bug (versions 0.2.15-0.3.0) causing reentrancy vulnerability. Multiple protocols potentially affected. CRV down 15% in last hour. Monitoring situation.
üêã 52,000,000 CRV (31,200,000 USD) transferred from unknown wallet to Binance. Possible dumping incoming.
